alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 2:07PM MDT until August 07 at 2:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Weld County in northeastern Colorado... Northeastern Morgan County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 245 PM MDT. * At 207 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles south of Keota, or 29 miles northwest of Fort Morgan, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... New Raymer and Antelope Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
